title: What's Next For The World's Favorite Roadster -- /ROAD TESTAMENT
description: Chris Harris guests by Skype to talk about why he's no fan of the latest Mazda MX-5 roadster, what he's hoping from the next generation, and what a Mazda-based Alfa Romeo spider might look like when it comes out in 2015. That is, if all goes as planned.
